database.name: VIEW EFIN_ACCOUNT_CHAPTER_REPORT_V
database.view: SELECT e.c_elementvalue_id AS efin_account_chapter_report_v_id, e.ad_client_id, e.ad_org_id, e.isactive, e.created, e.createdby, e.updated, e.updatedby, (COALESCE(e.value, '') || ' - ') || e.name AS account, e.value FROM c_elementvalue e WHERE e.value LIKE '21%' OR e.value LIKE '22%' OR e.value LIKE '23%' OR e.value LIKE '24%' OR e.value LIKE '25%' OR e.value LIKE '26%' OR e.value LIKE '27%' OR e.value LIKE '28%' OR e.value LIKE '3%' OR e.value LIKE '4%'
